title: 如何设置给某人双倍经验的权限
author: yjw2625590539
txt_content: 我想个服务器VIP双倍经验  请问怎么弄

replies.author: 红菜头糕
replies.txt_content:
LZ可以使用这个插件http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=277700&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E5%25A4%259A%25E5%2580%258D%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
然后把图里的




QQ图片20150815202817.png (12.72 KB, 下载次数: 7)

下载附件

2015-8-15 20:27 上传




multi改为2并给予VIP组/玩家dexp.vip权限即可
